channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: Rosemary Coogan
item.description: Rosemary Theresa Coogan (born 1991) is an astrophysicist and UK astronaut from Northern Ireland. Her research considers galaxy evolution and space-based telescopes. She is part of ESA's European Astronaut Corps.
